sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>Upon missing an opponent with a Lightsaber, Brawl, or Melee combat check, the character may spend one triumph or 3 advantage to upgrade the difficulty of the opponent's next combat check targeting the character during this encounter by the character's ranks in Feint.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <name>Feint</name> <number>TAL0001042</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:03:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>acfd9760db2e0c542901de90cf9619fa</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:03:31</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
